Demand the resignation of The Chief  Whipp Andrew Mitchell .
For his totally inappropiate comments to the securiyt police on trying to get through a gate which he should not have .The police were only doing their job and if that was anyone else he would have been the first to sat they where not doing their job .
I fell he has abused his position and should be sacked for his total disregard of the people who ensure his safety .
